releaseNotes: - Gestures: add full control over flar's sweep2wake gestures.
- Gestures: sweep2sleep: Added support to new sysf's.
- Gestures: dt2w: Restricted to enable or disable options (in-line with most of the modern devices).
- Gestures: Switch to card view for a better visual experience.
- Misc: added an option to disable android's native doze mode.
- Translations: Updated Chinese traditional (thanks again to @jason5545).
